snippet: There are still areas where a cheap apartment or share can be found in Brooklyn, but those pockets have moved farther and farther inland.
abstract: The Appraisal column notes that there are still areas where a cheap apartment or share can be found in Brooklyn, but those pockets have moved farther and farther inland.
lead_paragraph: There are still areas where a cheap apartment or share can be found in Brooklyn, but those pockets have moved farther and farther inland.

headline.seo: Stalking the $600 Apartment in a Changing Brooklyn
headline.main: As Brooklyn Rents Rise, She Stalks the $625 Apartment
headline.print_headline: As Rents Rise Across Brooklyn, She Stalks the Elusive $625 Apartment
